description: How closely have you been following the week in tech news? Take the quiz and put your knowledge to the test.
teaser: How closely have you been following the week in tech news? Take the quiz and put your knowledge to the test.
title: Free Bieber dot com? This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Tekzilla host Veronica Belmont takes on the tech gauntlet in our weekly Silicon Tally quiz. Play along at home, below.
